function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential presence of SARS-CoV-2 in the built environment","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious disease and causing infection","Mitigation":"Regular testing and disinfection of the built environment","Technologies":"COVID-19 testing kits, UV disinfection technology","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities"}]}
